Name: Forwards Baseball Cap
Ability 1 Effect: Wit attack. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage. If the target has been damaged by fastball 3 times during this combat, deal 2 damage instead.
Ability 2 Effect: You have a lot of baseballs.
Flavor Text: Three strikes and you're out... cold!

Name: Boxing Gear
Ability 1 Effect: Creatures that target you with an attack are dazed until the start of your next turn. Your Hit action deals 1 additional damage during your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: After being defeated, you can have a dramatic moment that firmly establishes you as the crowd favorite
Flavor Text: Float like a butterfly, sting like a poisonous frog-eating butterfly.

Name: Wizard Glasses
Ability 1 Effect: Wit -> Wit. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage, then choose one of their hats. That hat's bonuses do not apply until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You can convincingly speak in a cryptic tongue that's meaningless to all of frog kind, including yourself.
Flavor Text: Say, that scar on your head looks like an intriguing novel premise.

Name: Dog Collar
Ability 1 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage, then you and the target are stuck until the end of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You have a tremendous sense of smell
Flavor Text: If you're into that kind of thing.

Name: Therapist's Glasses
Ability 1 Effect: Wit -> Wit. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, the target has a crisis of meaning and is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You are good at determining the emotions of creating that are speaking to you.
Flavor Text: I'm hearing that my attacking you is making you feel... attacked?

Name: Hockey Mask
Ability 1 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 2 damage and you cannot use a hat action during your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: After you deal damage, you can taunt your enemy or do an awesome dance that everybody loves!
Flavor Text: The penalty box is like a home away from home!

Name: Bronze Medal
Ability 1 Effect: Your hit action deals 1 additional damage if it is the third time the target is taking damage during your turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You impress people with your athletic successes, but not like… a ton.
Flavor Text: You did it! Two other people did it better, but good for you!

Name: Gambler's Shades
Ability 1 Effect: Your hat actions 1 deal more damage if you equipped Gambler’s Shades this turn.
Ability 2 Effect: When taking the trade action, you may use the help action on the target immediately for no additional cost. (You can use this ability when trading this hat)
Flavor Text: Nice poker face! They don’t even know you’re worried they don’t like you.

Name: Traffic Cone
Ability 1 Effect: Until the start of your next turn, creatures are dazed while trying to attack you.
Ability 2 Effect: Your cone is a divisive fashion statement which sparks discourse amongst those in the scene.
Flavor Text: It's like a wizard hat that lets you control cars.

Name: Sweatband
Ability 1 Effect: When you take the Hop action you can immediately take the Hit action at no additional cost.
Ability 2 Effect: If you are not dazed and take damage that would reduce you to 0 health, you are instead reduced to 1 health and are dazed until your current health increases.
Flavor Text: Frogs don't usually sweat. Usually…

Name: Baby Bonnet
Ability 1 Effect: Wit -> Wit. Ranged. Targets all creatures that damaged you during their last turn. On each success, the target takes 1 damage and is embarrassed until the end of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You can pretend to be a child to great effect.
Flavor Text: Tadpoles can't wear hats. But if they could, it would be this one.

Name: Slimy Beanie
Ability 1 Effect: Roundness -> Sproink. Melee. Targets 1. On success, the target is stuck until the start of your next turn or until they take damage.
Ability 2 Effect: When you are dealt damage by a creature in your space, you can immediately take the hop action at no cost.
Flavor Text: Squelch, Squelch. Squish. Squelch…

Name: Clown Nose
Ability 1 Effect: You and an ally in the fight may exchange and equip any number of hats with each other, including this one. Your ally does not need to use an action.
Ability 2 Effect: You are a skilled clown and circus performer.
Flavor Text: You're funny, and yet, you're deeply troubled. How compelling!!

Name: Lifeguard Visor
Ability 1 Effect: Roll Roundness, if the result is 2 or greater, a creature in your space with current health 1 or less regains 1 health.
Ability 2 Effect: When you run, your beach bod bounces appealingly.
Flavor Text: Comes with sunscreen for your nose!

Name: Long Scarf
Ability 1 Effect: Sproink -> Sproink. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage. If you and another creature wearing this hat both damaged the target with That's a Wrap this turn, deal 1 more damage and the target is stuck until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: Two creatures can choose to wear this hat so long as they remain directly next to each other and both creatures are willing. It takes up a hat slot for both creatures.
Flavor Text: Works great for one super cold frog or two slightly chilly frogs!

Name: Hat Rack Hat
Ability 1 Effect: Once per round, when a creature in your space is knocked out, you may immediately Trade or Equip one of their hats without using an action.
Ability 2 Effect: You have one additional Hat Slot.
Flavor Text: This seems redundant…

Name: Backwards Baseball Cap
Ability 1 Effect: Wit attack. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage. If the target is an ally, they may make a ranged Wit attack that deals 3 damage on success.
Ability 2 Effect: You are approachable and cool to creatures younger than you. You appear immature to creatures older than you.
Flavor Text: Who needs sun protection. You're plenty cool.

Name: Safety Goggles
Ability 1 Effect: Wit attack. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage. If the target is stuck, deal 2 damage instead.
Ability 2 Effect: Whenever you gain a status effect, you can choose to be embarrassed for the same duration instead.
Flavor Text: You can never be too cautious.

Name: Detective Cap
Ability 1 Effect: You are the greatest detective.
Flavor Text: You notice the little things: blood stains, open bottles of poison, the like.

Name: Biker Bandana
Ability 1 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 2 damage.
Ability 2 Effect: You have a motorcycle! You can get on or off as an action. While you are riding your motorcycle, Road Rage does 1 additional damage, but you do not roll action dice.
Flavor Text: …And then the motorcycle said, "Vroom Vroom"

Name: Bunny Ears
Ability 1 Effect: Your hit action does 1 additional damage if you used the hop action on your last turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You cannot be stuck.
Flavor Text: Who knew frogs could hop like that?!

Name: Cook's Toque
Ability 1 Effect: Wit attack. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage and the target is embarrassed until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: Your Roundness (and maximum health) cannot be less than 2. Equipping or unequipping your hat increases or decreases your current health by 1.
Flavor Text: Anyone can cook! Anyone with equipment and ingredients anyway.

Name: Safari Hat
Ability 1 Effect: You can see really far. Roll an additional action die when making ranged Wit attacks.
Ability 2 Effect: Each time you knock out a creature, your next attack does 1 additional damage.
Flavor Text: Wow, I think I see a frog over there!

Name: Shower Cap
Ability 1 Effect: Wit -> Wit. Ranged. Targets 2. You reveal your awesome hair. Toss this hat. On success, the target is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You have beautiful hair which impresses anyone who is into that kind of thing.
Flavor Text: Be less wet.

Name: Investor Necktie
Ability 1 Effect: Ranged. Targets 1. If the target takes damage before the end of this turn, the target becomes dazed until the start of your next turn. If they don’t, you become dazed until the end of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: Ranged. Targets 1 hat. The hat becomes invested until the end of the fight. Whenever an invested hat’s ability does damage, you may restore 1 health to any creature in your space.
Flavor Text: Oh this is bull… in a good way!

Name: Rusty Bucket
Ability 1 Effect: Once per round when you are damaged by a creature in your space, you may immediately take the hit action against that creature.
Ability 2 Effect: You are kind of icky.
Flavor Text: Is the chin strap stock or aftermarket?

Name: Definitely Real Moustache
Ability 1 Effect: You may swap spaces with any creature on your team. You must trade one of their hats for Definitely Real Moustache.
Ability 2 Effect: You can effectively impersonate any creature with a moustache, or anyone that has worn this hat.
Flavor Text: Wait a minute, you look familiar… Was your younger brother just here?

Name: Tiny Deer Skull
Ability 1 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage. Then you may try to hop to a space of your choice. If you move spaces, the target moves with you.
Ability 2 Effect: You are much more intimidating to creatures with bones. Creatures without bones are unaffected.
Flavor Text: Where did you even get that?

Name: Wrestler's Mask
Ability 1 Effect: Roundness Attack. Melee. Targets 1. On success, you and the target are both stuck until the end of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 1 stuck creature. On success, deal 2 damage and you may immediately use Wrassle against the creature.
Flavor Text: You die a baby face or live long enough to see yourself become a heel.

Name: Nurse Cap
Ability 1 Effect: Roll Roundness, if the result is 2 or greater, target creature in your space regains 1 health.
Ability 2 Effect: When you take the help action you may give one 1 fewer action die and cause the helped action to deal 1 more damage if it is a melee attack.
Flavor Text: I need a joke about nurses, stat!

Name: Swimming Goggles
Ability 1 Effect: If you are falling from the air onto an enemy, you can roll Wit against your own Roundness. On success, the target takes 1 damage and is dazed until the start of your next turn. On failure, you take 1 damage.
Ability 2 Effect: You are an excellent middle-distance swimmer!
Flavor Text: When a nictitating membrane just isn't enough.

Name: Top Hat
Ability 1 Effect: Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage. The damaged creature is embarrassed until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You are very classy and can fit in with the ridiculously wealthy.
Flavor Text: Pip pip, Cheerio! Lowers cholesterol.

Name: Double Baseball Cap
Ability 1 Effect: (A) Pitching Rhythm:  Wit attack. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, deal 2 damage. If you already have used Pitching Rhythm once this round, you may immediately use it again against a different target at no additional cost.
Ability 2 Effect: (B) Ambiguous Silhouette: People have a hard time telling which way you are facing.
Flavor Text: Put sunscreen on your ears and you're good to go!

Name: Knight Helmet
Ability 1 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 2. On success, deal 1 damage. If you haven’t changed spaces since the beginning of your last turn, deal 2 damage instead.
Ability 2 Effect: People assume that you look very dashing underneath your helmet. If later they see you without it, they are thoroughly disappointed.
Flavor Text: Looking to protect yourself, or deal some damage?

Name: Wizard Hat
Ability 1 Effect: (A) Kablam: Wit attack. Ranged. Targets all creatures within a space. On success deal 3 damage. If you roll 1 or less, you take 3 damage.
Ability 2 Effect: You can create simple magical effects to wow everybody!
Flavor Text: Hop, you fools!

Name: Bucket Hat
Ability 1 Effect: Roundness  attack. Melee. Targets all creatures in your space including yourself. On success, that creature is smokey until the end of your next turn. A smokey creature is dazed and takes 1 less damage from Wit attacks.
Ability 2 Effect: If you are not already smokey, roll roundness against your own remaining health. On a success, you regain 2 health and are smokey until the end of your next turn.
Flavor Text: Woah man, your hat's got cool palm leaves.

Name: Fedora
Ability 1 Effect: Wit -> Wit. Melee. Targets 1. On success, the target takes 1 damage and is afraid until they leave your space.
Ability 2 Effect: You are very confident and believe you are very charismatic.
Flavor Text: The pleasure is yours, m’lady

Name: Coach Visor
Ability 1 Effect: Ranged. Targets 2. If both creatures are willing, the targets swap positions, exchange any statuses that are affecting them, and can trade any number of hats they are wearing without using an action.
Ability 2 Effect: Target creature is not affected by statuses until the end of this turn. (The statuses do not end early)
Flavor Text: How do I call a timeout?

Name: Dunce Cap
Ability 1 Effect: Roll Roundness against your own Wit. On success, you cannot take damage until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: If you are in a space with no other creatures at the start of your turn, you regain 1 health.
Flavor Text: Sit and think about what you did, if you even remember

Name: Pirate Bandana
Ability 1 Effect: When taking the hit action you roll an additional action die to hit and deal 1 additional damage.
Ability 2 Effect: You are very sturdy and hearty. You cannot be moved against your will.
Flavor Text: “Yo ho!” “You shouldn’t say that word.”

Name: Fencing Mask
Ability 1 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 1 creature that dealt damage to you last turn. On success, the target takes 3 damage.
Ability 2 Effect: If you would take 1 damage, you take none instead.
Flavor Text: “I don't think this is necessary to put up a fence, but safety first!”

Name: Hacker Glasses
Ability 1 Effect: Ranged. Targets 1 number on any hat in the fight. That number is one higher until the end of this turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You can fix printers, cell phones, and other devices better than the average frog.
Flavor Text: “I’m in… their computer system. I hacked it.”

Name: Clown Wig
Ability 1 Effect: Wit attack. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, deal 2 damage. The target is embarrassed until the end of their next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: Whenever you take damage, you may immediately toss a hat and reduce the damage taken by 1.
Flavor Text: My dad was a great clown. Those are some big shoes to fill…

Name: Football Helmet
Ability 1 Effect: Wit -> Wit. Ranged. Targets any number of creatures in a space. On success, creatures roll 1 additional action die when attacking creatures in their space this turn.
Ability 2 Effect: Your Hit action is now ranged and you can choose to roll Wit instead of Sproink when hitting.
Flavor Text: Omaha! Oklahoma! Oregano!

Name: Aviators
Ability 1 Effect: Wit attack. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage and the target is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You look really awesome and famous.
Flavor Text: One way mirrors have never been so acceptable!

Name: Historically Accurate Viking Helmet
Ability 1 Effect: Your hit action can target 2 creatures.
Ability 2 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 2 damage and the target is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Flavor Text: Horns are impractical…

Name: Silver Medal
Ability 1 Effect: Your hit action deals 2 additional damage if it is the second time the target is taking damage during your turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You have a deep unresolved anger and are very competitive.
Flavor Text: So close, but so far.

Name: Propellor Hat
Ability 1 Effect: Roll sproink against your own roundness. On success, you are propelled a massive distance into the air! During your next turn you may land in any space of your choice.
Ability 2 Effect: If you succeeded in using Up, Up, and Away last turn, Sproink attack. Targeting 1 creature you are falling towards. You take 2 damage. On success, The target takes 4 damage.
Flavor Text: Wheeeeeeeee!
